channel.title: Need help with the run server and compile
channel.description:
i was trying to run server and run compile i did the code which the tutorial told me to do, didnt work the old tutorial is better then the new if any1 can help me that would be great.
[b]Compile:[/b]
[b]@echo off COLOR 01 title youservername Client "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\java.exe" server pause[/b]
[b]Runserver:[/b]
@echo off title yourservernamehere java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server

item.title: Need help with the run server and compile
item.dc:creator: @weswes weswes
item.description:
@weswes wrote:

do you have a JDK?

if you do does the “6” in jdk1.5.0_06 match wat version of JDK you have?

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with the run server and compile

item.title: Need help with the run server and compile
item.dc:creator: @Redregious Redregious
item.description:
@Redregious wrote:

i was trying to run server and run compile i did the code which the tutorial told me to do, didnt work the old tutorial is better then the new if any1 can help me that would be great.

Compile:

@echo off
COLOR 01
title youservername Client
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\java.exe” server
pause

Runserver:

@echo off
title yourservernamehere
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with the run server and compile
